attributes.action: stop cold call telephone calls land line and mobile phones
attributes.additional_details: the other day I had 15 such calls and I had to answer each one as I was waiting for a important phone call
attributes.background: I want to stop unwanted telephone calls from ppi ,loan company's ,prepay funerals ect

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105999

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
